tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: TEENS REACT TO GANGNAM STYLE
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Gangnam Style Bonus: bit.ly Thanks for the LIKE & FAV! Teens or Kids React every Sunday! Subscribe: bit.ly Watch all episodes of TEENS REACT: dft.ba Watch our weekly sitcom MyMusic! www.youtube.com Watch all episodes of REACT (including Elders React) here! bit.ly Subscribe to PSY! www.youtube.com Created and Directed by Benny & Rafi Fine (The Fine Brothers) MAIN CHANNEL:www.youtube.com SECOND CHANNEL:www.youtube.com FACEBOOK:www.facebook.com TWITTER:www.twitter.com GOOGLE+:www.gplus.to PINTEREST: www.pinterest.com T-SHIRTS:www.thefinebros.spreadshirt.com IPHONE APP WEEKLY NEWS PODCAST: www.awkpodcast.tumblr.com SEND US STUFF TheFineBros PO BOX 4324 Valley Village, CA 91617-4324 ---------------------------- VIDEO FEATURED IN THIS EPISODE: PSY - GANGNAM STYLE (강남스타일) M/V www.youtube.com Subscribe to PSY! www.youtube.com --------------------------------- This episode featured the following cool teenagers! NOTE: Teens on the show must be at least 14 and in high school, any teens on Kids React will "graduate" to Teens React when they enter high school, if a Teen graduates high school while on the show, they will remain on the show until they turn 19. Eric, age 15 Lia, age 15 Adam, age 16 Alix, age 16 Kennedy, age 16 Rachel, age 16 Jade, age 17 Madison, age 17 Tom, age 17 Devin, age 18 Isaac, age 18- HAPPY BIRTHDAY! ------------------ If you see this, type "TEENS REACT FTW" in the comments - and please LIKE/FAV! Music by Cormac Bluestone www.youtube.com Graphics by Will ...

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Bubblegum-pop xD﻿
omg yes i requested this xD﻿
Opp opp﻿ opp opp open condom store
0:56 he just said justin﻿ bieber has swag. funny joke. :)
It does sound like condom store﻿
i hate pop, but this﻿ guy is awesome ima listen to it
PSY has just﻿ redefined swag.
"That's all cocaine" ﻿
I'm still registering all of﻿ this.
SwAg﻿
Wooo, I'm not the only one﻿ who uses 9gag!
1:05 he thinks PSY says:open condom﻿ store lol
14 days ago this had over 30 mil views, now over﻿ 75 mil views
I watch this﻿ video every day. <3
Gandalf﻿ Style 3:03
Humping﻿ faces is normal :3
I love korea I love kpop﻿
His swag is literally off the chart... Like﻿ Justin beiber.... him.
Who﻿ needs swag when you got gangnam style?!
I like Reddit more than 9gag lol, no comment war﻿ initiated lol
lol is it open condom style﻿ or open condom store LOL
PSY has﻿ swag!
lol 3:26﻿ she cracks me up!
